title: Trunk Show/Meet the Designer: Monika Knutsson presents Gilded Lace Jewelry
desc: Jewelry designer Monika Knutsson takes vintage designs to a whole new level with her? Gilded Lace?collection . Preserving the lost art of lacemaking, Knutsson uses a gilding process to turn pieces of century-old lace into contemporary wearable art. Meet Monika on December 9th at Yaf Sparkle Boutique and try on her latest creations, chat about everything handmade and enjoy a one-time-only-discount on a true one-of-a-kind piece that night.
